msbt.message: Monday nights used to be when my favorite TV show came on
There was this one episode where they spoofed that famous book, .It was so hilarious, . I quoted that episode for years.<10_4 /> "I'll show YOU pedantic!" Bwa ha ha!
They'd have these skits where pop stars and athletes would swap places. They were usually AWFUL.But sometimes bigwig could really sing, or a pop star could pass for a pro player!
That show was actually the first place I'd ever heard of those long sandwiches.Y'know, like hoagies, grinders, herossubs! I'd never even heard of them before. How bizarre is that?
I've been havin' these REALLY weird dreams lately
I have this recurring one where I slip and fall and my body just flips out then I wake up FLIPPING OUT.It's pretty wild when you wake up ninja-kicking a lamp, .
Like I dreamed was running a million miles an hour, then leaped into the sky.And never came down! I just stood there smiling 'causewow!

There's the one dream where I'm here on , except everything isstrange.The sky is orange! And the sun looks like it's coming up instead of going down like it's supposed to!Almost everyone's asleep, but if I see someone, they'll say something crazy like, "Good morning."I have this dream every few days now. It's so weird, and it's really, REALLY hard to wake up from!
Wednesday, huh?
My school used to get out early on Wednesdays. I'd use the extra time to get a head start on homework.Ha! Nope! I'd go find my buddies and we'd ride our bikes till it got too dark, ! Bwa ha ha!
Mom used to make her famous on Wednesdays I should learn how to make that.
When I was a little ankle biter, Wednesdays meant helping Mom clip coupons so we could buy groceries.
Thursday already? Whew! Y'know, there used to be some awesome TV shows on Thursdays!
There was one show I liked where they'd follow a geek around and talk about whatever they were into.I'd learn about , and then next week would be about . It was cool!
Like one where they'd get a bunch of experts on together and make 'em compete.It got SUPER intense, !

One show had celebrities reading books while actors performed 'em.It was dull, but it let me skip reading
for school! Bwa ha ha!
Aww yeah! Made it to Friday!
Every Friday, I try to get in a little -time. I like to get my head straight for the weekend!
So, , whatcha up to this weekend? Me? I'm not gonna do anything. I can't wait!
My old man always used to say "TGIF" on FridaysI think it stood for "Thursday's Gone, I'm Flying." Yupdoesn't make sense to me either, .
Saturday already! Wow! Felt like that week just flew by!
Saturday used to mean hangin' out with my buds waaaaay into the night. I miss those days, .
Even on Saturdays, my parents used to tell me to go to bed early.Joke was on them though. I'd either sneak out, or stay up in my room watching TV, !
What'd I even do this week? Ah, who cares! If today's good, then the week's good, right?
Whoa, today's Sunday?!
Ha! You look like you're maxing out your weekend, while I've barely left my pajamas, . Bwa ha!
Hey there, ! You get anything done this weekend? Me neither. It was great! Bwa ha ha!
You all set for Monday? I feel like I could use at least another six or seven weekend days
